excerpt: "Global Artificial Blood Market is estimated to reach $10.73 billion by 2025; growing at a CAGR of 20.3% from 2017 to 2025. Artificial blood, also known as synthetic blood substitute or blood surrogate is a substance used as a replacement to biological blood."
